details.description: The script is designed to run a pipeline for analyzing 5-hydroxymethylcytosine (5hmC) data on a LSF (Load Sharing Facility) cluster. It utilizes various tools, including bash, bowtie, samtools, bedtools, and R, to perform alignment, coverage calculation, and downstream analysis. The script relies on a configuration file (config.sh) to specify parameters and file paths. It also leverages LSF's job submission system to distribute tasks across the cluster nodes.
